name: rook (itch)
description:
ROOK

Live the simple bird life. 

Scavenge for food and build a nest on a remote farm. 

Fly around & explore, but watch out for hazards, such as snakes, hunters & angry birds. 

CONTROLS

WASD to move on the ground

Mouse to look

Space to lift off/flap wings

Right mouse button to land

E to interact

Current Sokpop Collection

Join the 3$ Sokpop Patreon now to get this game, and our previous game The Hour of the Rat, immediately!
